ErrorIndex.title: Wrapper for index information inside an error.

ErrorResponse.description: Generic error response for REST APIs

code.description: the numeric HTTP error code for the response.

details.description: The optional details of the error response.

dictionary.description:
Dictionary/map of associated data/information relevant to the error.
The error "message" may contain {{name}} escapes that should be substituted
with information from this dictionary.

domain.description:
The "domain" for the error.  If empty, it is an EDA
core error.  Alternatively it can be an EDA application
"apiVersion" value (e.g. interfaces.eda.nokia.com/v1alpha1)
indicating that the error is specific to that application.
The domain gives the receiver information that they can use
to help them interpret the "internal" error code value, or
to find an internationalization translation for the message.

errors.description:
Collection of errors in cases where more than one exists. This needs to be
flexible so we can support multiple formats

internal.description: Internal error code in cases where we don't have an array of errors

message.description: The basic text error message for the error response.

ref.description: Reference to the error source. Should typically be the URI of the request

type.description:
URI pointing at a document that describes the error and mitigation steps
If there is no document, point to the RFC for the HTTP error code

Status.title: Status is a return value for calls that don't return other objects.

com.nokia.eda.connect.v1.ConnectAudit.description: ConnectAudit is the Schema for the connectaudits API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to connect.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to ConnectAudit

spec.description: ConnectAuditSpec defines the desired state of ConnectAudit.

connectPluginName.description: ConnectPluginName refers to the ConnectPlugin being audited.
connectPluginName.title: Plugin Name

finished.description: Finished indicates whether the ConnectAudit is done running.
finished.title: Finished

scope.description:
Scope indicates the scope of the ConnectAudit.
Currently supported scopes: PLUGIN
scope.title: Scope

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ConnectAuditStatus defines the observed state of ConnectAudit.

endTime.description: EndTime is when the ConnectAudit reaches a completed State.
endTime.title: End Time

enqueueTime.description: EnqueueTime is the starting time of the ConnectAudit.
enqueueTime.title: Enqueue Time

failureReason.description: FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.
failureReason.title: Failure Reason

outcome.description:
Outcome indicates the outcome of the ConnectAudit once it is Finished.
Possible values are Success|Failure.
outcome.title: Outcome

results.description: Results is a list of Audit substeps performed.

auditType.description:
AuditType is the type of this Result.
Possible values are ConnectPluginAudit
auditType.title: Audit Type

failureReason.description: FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.
failureReason.title: Failure Reason

foundDiscrepancies.description: FoundDiscrepancies is a list of found and or corrected discrepancies.

connectResourceKind.description: ConnectResourceKind is the kind of the resource in Connect.
connectResourceKind.title: Connect Resource Kind

connectResourceName.description: ConnectResourceName is the (k8s) name of the resource in Connect.
connectResourceName.title: Connect Resource Name

failureReason.description: FailureReason indicates the reason for a Failure Outcome.
failureReason.title: Failure Reason

outcome.description:
Outcome indicates the outcome of this Discrepancy.
Possible values are Success|Failure
outcome.title: Outcome

pluginResourceKind.description: PluginResourceKind is the kind of the resource in the Plugin environment.
pluginResourceKind.title: Plugin Resource Kind

pluginResourceURI.description: PluginResourceURI is the URI of the resource in the Plugin environment.
pluginResourceURI.title: Plugin Resource URI

type.description: Type of discrepancy found during the Audit.
type.title: Type

foundDiscrepancies.title: Found Discrepancies

outcome.description:
Outcome indicates the outcome of this Result once it is Finished.
Possible values are Success|Failure
outcome.title: Outcome

state.description:
State indicates the state of this Result.
Possible values are Scheduled|Finished|InProgress
state.title: State

results.title: Results

state.description:
State indicates the state of the overall ConnectAudit.
Possible values are Scheduled|Finished|InProgress.
state.title: State

totalNumberOfDiscrepancies.description: TotalNumberOfDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Audit Report.
totalNumberOfDiscrepancies.title: Total Number of Discrepancies

totalNumberOfFailedDiscrepancies.description:
TotalNumberOfFailedDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Results that have failed
to be resolved. Manual action is required here.
totalNumberOfFailedDiscrepancies.title: Total Number of Failed Discrepancies

totalNumberOfSuccessfulDiscrepancies.description:
TotalNumberOfSuccessfulDiscrepancies indicates the amount of entries in the Audit Report that have successfully
been resolved.
totalNumberOfSuccessfulDiscrepancies.title: Total Number of Successful Discrepancies

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.connect.v1.ConnectAuditLis.description: ConnectAuditList is a list of connectaudits

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters.  Each component must start and end with a lower case alphanumeric character and the body of the component is made up of zero or more lower case alphanumeric and hyphen characters.

com.nokia.eda.connect.v1.ConnectInterfac.description: ConnectInterface is the Schema for the connectinterfaces API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to connect.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to ConnectInterface

spec.description: ConnectInterfaceSpec defines the desired state of ConnectInterface.

bond.description: Bond is an Optional Bond definition, indicating the naming of a Bond on the Compute.

chassisId.description: ChassisID is the Chassis Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
chassisId.title: LLDP Chassis ID

hostName.description: HostName is the FQDN of the host this compute port belongs to (eg. compute01.example.com).
hostName.title: Host Name

interfaceName.description: InterfaceName is the interface name of the compute port (eg. eth0).
interfaceName.title: Interface Name

portId.description: PortID is the Port Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
portId.title: LLDP Port ID

systemName.description: SystemName is the name of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
systemName.title: LLDP System Name

bond.title: Bond

members.description:
Members is a list of InterfaceMembers indicating which Compute Interfaces are part of this ConnectInterface.
For non-LAG interfaces, this is a list of one element.

chassisId.description: ChassisID is the Chassis Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
chassisId.title: LLDP Chassis ID

hostName.description: HostName is the FQDN of the host this compute port belongs to (eg. compute01.example.com).
hostName.title: Host Name

interfaceName.description: InterfaceName is the interface name of the compute port (eg. eth0).
interfaceName.title: Interface Name

portId.description: PortID is the Port Id of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
portId.title: LLDP Port ID

systemName.description: SystemName is the name of the top-of-rack switch to which this compute interface is connected, received through LLDP.
systemName.title: LLDP System Name

members.title: Members

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ConnectInterfaceStatus defines the observed state of ConnectInterface

currentInterface.description: Indicates the current EDA CachedInterface this ConnectInterface is connected to.
currentInterface.title: Current Interface

operationalStatus.description: Indicates the current operational state of the ConnectInterface
operationalStatus.title: Operational Status

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.connect.v1.ConnectInterfac.description: ConnectInterfaceList is a list of connectinterfaces

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: A valid name is made up of one or more components where each component is separated by period characters. com.nokia.eda.connect.v1.ConnectPlugin.description: ConnectPlugin is the Schema for the connectplugins API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to connect.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to ConnectPlugin

spec.description: ConnectPluginSpec defines the desired state of ConnectPlugin.

heartbeatInterval.description:
HeartbeatInterval indicates in seconds the interval in which the Plugin will heartbeat.
When the interval is 0, heartbeating will be disabled.
heartbeatInterval.title: Heartbeat Interval

name.description: Name is a human-readable representation of the Plugin.
name.title: Name

pluginType.description: PluginType identifies the type of the Plugin. Eg. VMware, OpenStack.
pluginType.title: Plugin Type

supportedActionables.description: SupportedActionables is a List of Actionable identifiers that this Plugin supports.
supportedActionables.title: Supported Actionables

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ConnectPluginStatus defines the observed state of ConnectPlugin.

stale.description:
When a plugin registers with a certain heartbeatinterval and it does not meet that contract, Connect will assume
that the plugin is Stale / non-responsive. An alarm is raised when the plugin is Stale.
stale.title: Stale

status.title: Status

com.nokia.eda.connect.v1.ConnectPluginAc.description: ConnectPluginActionable is the Schema for the connectpluginactionables API

x-eda-nokia-com.ui-pattern-error: The apiVersion must be set to connect.eda.nokia.com/v1
The kind must be set to ConnectPluginActionable

spec.description: ConnectPluginActionableSpec defines the desired state of ConnectPluginActionable.

attributes.description: Attributes is a map of attributes associated with the Verb for this Actionable.

verb.description: Verb is the keyword for the operation that should be executed by the Plugin.

spec.title: Specification

status.description: ConnectPluginActionableStatus defines the observed state of ConnectPluginActionable.
status.title: Status
